name: Transatlantic Liners 1889
description:
** Super-Early Beta now available! **

Jump into the golden age of transatlantic steam ship travel

"Transatlantic Liners 1889" is a retro-inspired strategic trade-simulation putting you as the director of the "Royal White Star Lines" company - right into the golden times of transatlanic ocean travel! 

You'll start in 1889 with 500.000 $ and a brand-new steam ship mooring at the port of Liverpool - the homebase of the "Royal White Star Lines". You can sail and set up routes to the major cities of that time including

  • New York
  • South Hampton
  • New Orleans
  • Buenos Aires
  • Capetown
  • .... many more

Choose your serviced routes wisely, watch your costs and profits, take risks but keep an eye on what happens in the world and adjust your strategy if needed. A timeline including real historical events and events created by yourself will accompany your play - you're ready to rewrite history!

As you earn your first chunks of profits, invest into port enhancements, routes, and new steam liners, improve your service and build your steam ship empire.  Are you able to catch the Blue Ribbon and set you on top of your competitors ?

So are you ready to be the next  steam ship tycoon and rewrite the story of a new "Titanic" ?

PC and Mac builds will be available soon.
